attributes.action: More activities for kids in Rhondda Cynon taff
attributes.background: Pontypridd kids are getting a load of abuse and being victimised for being bored, no activities for kids and also if they go to the park they get thrown out by police or security it's disgusting

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local facilities for young people are the responsibility of your local council. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
